terms.title: Terms & Conditions

items.1: Session Duration: Each session is 60 or 120 minutes. You must vacate the pod immediately when your time ends.
items.2: User Eligibility: A subscription is valid only for the registered user. Subscriptions are non-transferable.
items.3: No Refunds: Payments for expired or non‑cancelled sessions are non‑refundable.
items.4: Booking & Cancellation: You may cancel up to 1 hour before your session. No‑shows count as used sessions.
items.5: Safety & Hygiene: No food, smoking, alcohol, or hazardous activities in the pod.
items.6: Health Responsibility: You assume all risks related to health issues (illness, injury).
items.7: Personal Belongings: We are not responsible for any lost or forgotten items inside the pod.
items.8: Children & Guests: Family subscription allows one child. Student or guest access requires separate approval.
items.9: Technical Issues: In case of pod malfunction, sessions will be automatically reinstated or compensated.

terms.agree: By registering, you fully agree to the <1>terms and conditions</1>.
terms.mustAgree: Please agree to the terms and conditions before signing up.

sessionLimitError: You can't book more than 2 active sessions on the selected day
